name: Super Smash Cat: Extreme (BETA RELEASE)
description:
The last game of the Super Smash Cat series… This version wont be a paid version until Saturday. but if you buy I would be great full!

This is the 4th Smash Cat Game.

P2: Arrow Keys, Use Down Arrow to attack. P1: WAD, Use S to attack. P3: FTH, Use G to attack. This should be very simple, as I updated the controls because of confusion. This game is better with 2 players, if you are alone, I would practice in bot mode.

DESCRIPTION

Super Smash Cat is a crossover fighting game series published by SchoolDeveloper, and primarily features characters from various Catendo franchises. The series was created by SchoolDeveloper, who has directed every game in the series. The gameplay objective differs from that of traditional fighters in that the aim is to knock opponents off the stage instead of depleting life bars. This is a game focused on being the base line of future Super Smash Cat games.
